name: Attuned_Blessing_of_the_Zephyr_B
display_name: Attuned Blessing of the Zephyr A
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Blessing of the Zephyr B
display_help: Enhances the range of a teleport power by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}%, the flight speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}%, the jumping ability of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}%, the run speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement can be slotted into any travel power and will enhance run speed, jumping, flight speed and teleport range.
power_display_names: Blessing of the Zephyr: Run Speed, Jump, Flight Speed, Range/Endurance
